author: mysticryuujin
content:
I created a PR to try to start the process of standardizing the response and formats for debug_trace* methods, starting with 4 small basic tests (2 blockByNumber and 2 traceCall) that clients already don't agree on (though most clients are very close)
https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/728

I also created a PR in hive to enable the `trace` namespace on the clients that support it so we can add methods like `trace_block` and `trace_transaction` in the future
https://github.com/ethereum/hive/pull/1378

author: boma_naps
content: Iâ€™m not sure how this test was generated, but we also need the test in https://github.com/lightclient/rpctestgen. The idea is that when you run the test generator, it should automatically generate the .io file, which you then send as a PR to the execution-apis repo. The corresponding test case should live in rpctestgen.

author: mysticryuujin
content: Ok, I'll look into that tomorrow. Thanks for the explanation.
